results.title: [Evaluation of long-term therapy influence with angiotensin converting enzyme inhibitor lisinopril on morphofunctional parameters of the left ventricle, peripheral artery endothelium disfunction and painless myocardial ischemia in premenopausal women with hypertension].
results.text_hl: [Evaluation of long-term therapy influence with @GENE_ACE @GENE_1636 @@@angiotensin converting enzyme@@@ inhibitor @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ on morphofunctional parameters of the left ventricle, peripheral artery @DISEASE_Body_Dysmorphic_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D057215 @@@endothelium disfunction@@@ and painless @<m>DISEASE_Myocardial_Ischemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017202 @@@myocardial ischemia@@@ in premenopausal @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ with @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@].

results.title: [Clinico-metabolic and anti-ischemic effects of angiotensin converting enzyme inhibitor lisinopril and its role in the process of left ventricular remodeling in patients with diabetic heart].
results.text_hl: Clinico-metabolic and anti-@DISEASE_Brain_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D002545 @@@ischemic@@@ effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ and its influence on processes of left @DISEASE_Ventricular_Remodeling @DISEASE_MESH:D020257 @@@ventricular remodeling@@@ were studied on 64 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Myocardial_Ischemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017202 @@@ischemic heart disease@@@ and stable class II-III @DISEASE_Neurocirculatory_Asthenia @DISEASE_MESH:D009449 @@@effort angina@@@ combined with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes mellitus@@@; 30 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ received standard therapy, 34--standard therapy plus @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ (5 mg/day).

citations.NLM: Chilikina NS, Khasaev ASh, Abusueva ZS. [Clinico-metabolic and anti-ischemic effects of angiotensin converting enzyme inhibitor lisinopril and its role in the process of left ventricular remodeling in patients with diabetic heart]. Kardiologiia. 2006;46(9):15-8. PMID: 17047617

results.title: [Stiffness of the Arterial Wall and Central Hemodynamics During Long-Term Combination Antihypertensive Therapy].
results.text_hl: Aim of the METR study - to assess effect of antihypertensive therapy with fixed combination of @GENE_ACE @GENE_1636 @@@angiotensin converting enzyme@@@ inhibitor @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ (10 mg) and @CHEMICAL_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002118 @@@calcium@@@ antagonist @CHEMICAL_Amlodipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ (5 mg) on parameters of arterial wall stiffness and central hemodynamics in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with stage I-II @DISEASE_Essential_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D000075222 @@@essential hypertension@@@ (@DISEASE_Essential_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D000075222 @@@EH@@@) and functional class II-III @<m>DISEASE_Myocardial_Ischemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017202 @@@ischemic heart disease@@@.

citations.NLM: Prokofieva EB, Glezer MG. [Stiffness of the Arterial Wall and Central Hemodynamics During Long-Term Combination Antihypertensive Therapy]. Kardiologiia. 2015;55(4):19-24. PMID: 26502498
citations.BibTeX: @article{26502498, title={[Stiffness of the Arterial Wall and Central Hemodynamics During Long-Term Combination Antihypertensive Therapy].}, author={Prokofieva EB and Glezer MG}, journal={Kardiologiia}, volume={55}, number={4}, pages={19-24}}

results.title: Angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitors post-myocardial infarction.
results.text_hl: Results from SOLVD, SAVE, AIRE, GISSI-III, ISIS-IV, and the Chinese @CHEMICAL_Captopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002216 @@@Captopril@@@ Trial suggest that therapy with ACE inhibitors, at least with @CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@enalapril@@@, @CHEMICAL_Captopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002216 @@@captopril@@@, @CHEMICAL_Ramipril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017257 @@@ramipril@@@, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@, induce significant reduction in morbidity and mortality rates in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Myocardial_Ischemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017202 @@@ischemic heart disease@@@, @DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@myocardial infarction@@@, and a wide range of ventricular function and @DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@myocardial infarction@@@.

citations.NLM: Young JB. Angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitors post-myocardial infarction. Cardiol Clin. 1995 Aug;13(3):379-90. PMID: 7585774
citations.BibTeX: @article{7585774, title={Angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitors post-myocardial infarction.}, author={Young JB}, journal={Cardiol Clin}, volume={13}, number={3}, pages={379-90}}
